# Cache

## Types of caches

### In Memory Caches

- Application Cache

- Object Cache

- Session Cache

- Distributed Cache

### Distributed Caches

- Distributed Cache
  - Redis
  - Memcached

### Edge Caches

- Content Delivery Cache (CDN)

- DNS Cache

### Client-Side Caches

- Browser Cache

- Local Storage, Sessions, Cookies

### Database Caches

- Database Cache

- Disk Cache
